fields.name: Grid Columns
fields.description: How many columns of bubbles are contained within the playing field (X dimension)

fields.name: Grid Rows
fields.description: How many rows of bubbles are contained within the playing field (y dimension)

fields.name: Starting Rows
fields.description: How many rows of bubbles the grid starts with

fields.name: Bubble Points
fields.description: How many points a single bubble is worth

fields.name: Max Shots
fields.description: How many shots a player can fire before the game ends

fields.name: Row Turns
fields.description: How many shots a player can take without making a match before new rows of bubbles are added

fields.name: Rows Added
fields.description: How many rows are added once the turn counter hits 0

fields.name: Game Over Text
fields.description: The message that is displayed with a round/game is over
